name: Albatros White Beach - By Pickalbatros
location: El Corniche St, Al Mamsha El Seyahi, Hurghada, Egypt
information:
This property is 7 minutes walk from the beach. Featuring an outdoor pool, children's playground and terrace, Albatros White Beach - By Pickalbatros is set in Hurghada in the Red Sea Region and only 5 km from New Marina. Free WiFi is available in all public areas.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area and a terrace or balcony. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and offers free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests have free access to the gym, 2 adult pools and multi sports court.

Guests can take advantage of the properties facilities such as a car hire or the hotel's 24 hour front desk. The property also offers the opportunity to snorkel and dive. Added amenities include 4 kids pool and darts. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

District Court of Hurghada is 8 km from Albatros White Beach - By Pickalbatros, while Giftun Island is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 3 km from the property.

Couples particularly like the location ? they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip.

name: Naama Bay
location: Naama Bay El Salam Road, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
information:
This property is 2 minutes walk from the beach. Situated in the heart of the popular Naama Bay, Naama Bay Promenade Beach Resort Managed By Accor offers spacious accommodation overlooking the hotel's tropical gardens, the extensive pool or beach panoramic view.                                                                                                                                                                                                                     It also features a private beach. Guests can enjoy free WiFi in the public areas of the hotel.
Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is only 10 km away from the property. The hotel provides free parking.
This is our guests' favourite part of Sharm El Sheikh, according to independent reviews.
Couples particularly like the location ? they rated it 8.7 for a two-person trip.

name: Sharm El Luli
location: Sharm El Luli, Halayeb We Shalateen Road, Egypt
information: It is located 60 km south of Marsa Alam.                                                                                                                                                           It extends on a wonderful lake whose waters are always warm, transparent as crystal, and gradient colors.                                                It is within the Wadi El-Gemal Reserve, which qualified it well to rank first in the list of the top 10 beaches in the Middle East for the year 2018, issued by the "TripAdvisor" website, which specializes in travel and tourism around the world.                                                           It features a "cheese" drink, a type of coffee popular with locals in the area.

name: El Fanar
location: El Fanar St. Beside El Fanar Hotel, Sharm El Sheikh 46628 Egypt

name: Fayrouz Resort
location: El Salam Road, Naama Bay, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
information: This property is 3 minutes walk from the beach. This resort overlooks the Red Sea in Naama Bay, 15 minutes' drive from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport. It features 4 outdoor pools and a long private beach.                                                                                         Each of the spacious rooms at Fayrouz Resort has high-speed internet access, a work desk and deluxe bathroom amenities. Some rooms look out over the resort's pool area.                                                                                                                                                 Water sports are available with Fayrouz Resort's diving and snorkelling centre. There are also tennis courts and a fully equipped fitness centre. An active kids' club and children's pool areas completes the resort.                                                                                               The Fayrouz Resort's Wadi Restaurant offers an outdoor terrace with views over the beachfront promenade. Starlight Dinner features an open-air buffet in a Bedouin setting. There are also seafood and Italian restaurants.                                                                             The centre of Naama Bay is just 5 minutes' walk from Fayrouz Resort.                                                                                                        This is our guests' favourite part of Sharm El Sheikh, according to independent reviews.                                                                      Couples particularly like the location ? they rated it 9.2 for a two-person trip.

name: Smokery Beach
location: Red Sea New Marina, El Gouna, Hurghada 84513 Egypt.
information: #41 of 89 Restaurants in El Gouna. location: Cornish Road, Hurghada, Egypt
information: This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Located on the beach in Hurghada, this hotel is less than 150 m from the Red Sea. It has free WIFI in the Lobby area, and features a large outdoor pool with sun-lounger terrace.                                                                     Hurghada International Airport is located 12 km from Hotelux Marina Beach Hurghada. Hurghada International Port is less than 200 m away. name: Movenpick Resort Soma Bay
location: KM 49 Hurghada/Safaga Road, Soma Bay, Soma Bay, 84711 Hurghada, Egypt.
information: This property is 18 minutes walk from the beach. Featuring a spa and 3 pools, Moevenpick Resort Soma Bay offers luxury accommodation in Soma Bay. With its own private beach, this 5-star hotel provides water sports activities such as diving and windsurfing. Free WiFi is available in the rooms.

name: Panorama Bungalows Resort El Gouna
location: El Gouna, El Gouna, 99999 Hurghada, Egyptÿ
information: This property is 9 minutes walk from the beach. Offering a private beach on the Red Sea, this 4-star resort offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace. Its outdoor pool is surrounded by landscaped gardens, and there is a health club.                                     A satellite TV and a minibar are in Panorama El Gouna?s bright rooms. Some offer views of the sea or gardens, while others overlook the lagoon. Each has a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer.                                                                                                   Massages and various beauty treatments are offered in Panorama?s spa. Guests can relax in the sauna or play a game of table tennis. There is a playground and kids' pool with water toys for younger guests.                                                                                                      El Gouna Golf Club is 5 minutes? walk from Panorama Bungalows. The Abu Tig Marina is 5 minutes by car, and a shuttle can be arranged.                                                                                                                                                                                                   Couples particularly like the location ? they rated it 9.6 for a two-person trip.

name: Giftun Azur Resort
location: Village Road, Hurghada, Egyptÿ
information: Nestled among lush gardens with palm trees, Giftun Azur Resort features 7 restaurants and 7 bars. It has outdoor pools, and spacious rooms with sea, pool or garden views.                                                                                                                                                        Giftun?s water sports activities include diving, snorkeling, banana boat ride and more.                                                                        Hurghada International Airport is 3 km away. A car rental service is available.                                                                                     Couples particularly like the location ? they rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.

name: ?El Qulan Mangrove Forest
location: El Qulan Mangrove Forest, Marsa Alam, Egypt
information: Nice place to be, Saphit blue water, white sand. And quiet! Have a mangrove and eycatcher and whe see Eagle See. Relaxing in the Bedouin tent with a Bedouin tee was a treat.                                                                                                                                                  #8 of a total of 20 things to do in Marsa Alam                                                                                                                                               Couples particularly like the location ? they rated it 4.5  for a two-person trip.

The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and currency exchange for guests.                                                                                                                       Beau Site Belle Vue Hotel offers a terrace. name: Moses Coast Resort
location: KM 30 - Ras Sidr, Ras Sidr, Egypt
information: Featuring a private sandy beach, the 4-star Mousa Coast Resort offers modern accommodations with free Wi-Fi. It also has an outdoor pool, restaurant and bar.                                                                                                                                                                       Mangiamo Restaurant serves an … la carte and buffet menu with international, Middle Eastern and local cuisine. Other dining venues include Red Fish, which serves fresh seafood, while La Pergola serves a variety of grilled meats.                                                               You can enjoy playing billiards, table tennis or volleyball for a fee. Horseback riding exercises and activities can be arranged upon request, and the tour desk offers local excursions. Mousa Coast Resort is located 150 km from Cairo.

name: Shark's Bay Beach
location: Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
information: Shark Bay consists of beaches located 10 km north of Sharm El Sheikh Airport. What was once a quiet diving spot is now dominated by a group of five-star resorts. The area was called Shark Bay, because it was home to sharks that once lived in this area, but today it is devoid of these animals.

name: Solymar Soma Beach
location: KM 49, Hurghada Road, Soma Bay, 84517 Hurghada, Egypt
information: Located in Hurghada, less than 1 km from Sentido Palm Royal Soma Bay, Solymar Soma Beach provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers free WiFi (limited speed), a garden and a terrace. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge and currency exchange for guests.                                               The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. All rooms at the hotel have a wardrobe and a private bathroom.                                                                                                                                            Guests at Solymar Soma Beach can enjoy a buffet breakfast.                                                                                                                     The property offers a children's playground.                                                                                                                                               New Marina is 49 km from Solymar Soma Beach, while Giftun Island is 46 km away. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 45 km from the hotel.                                                                                                                                                                   Couples particularly liked the location, and rated it 9.0 for a two-person trip.
